Which tomcat version should I use?
It depends on the version of the Servlet API you need.
Tomcat 3 supports the 2.2 API
Tomcat 4 supports the 2.3 API
Tomcat 5 supports the 2.4 API
Tomcat 5 is alpha quality. It isn't ready for production.
There are 2 flavors of Tomcat 4, 4.0.X and 4.1.X. The 4.1.x version is still slowly receiving new enhancements but this trend is subsiding while more attention is made on Tomcat5. Version 4.0.X is only receiving security fixes. Both (4.0 and 4.1) are suitable for production. (YMMV). Version 4.1.X is significantly faster than 4.0.X.
Tomcat 3 I know nothing about with respect to performance and maintenance. AFAIK - it is still receiving security fixes. The
tomcat home page should have the correct recommendation.
When will the next version be released?
When it is ready.
